articles.title: Keeping the Web Up Under the Weight of AI Crawlers
articles.description: If you run a site on the open web, chances are you've noticed a big increase in traffic over the past few months, whether or not your site has been getting more viewers, and you're not alone. Operators everywhere have observed a drastic increase in automated traffic—bots—and in most cases attribute...

articles.title: Meta taps Klarna for 'Play Now, Pay Later' headset offer
articles.description: Meta has teamed up with BNPL firm Klarna to launch a 'Play Now, Pay Later' bundle for its mixed reality headsets in the UK.

articles.title: Assassin's Creed and other games are using historians to get their facts right, and a new study shows it's fostering an interest in history
articles.description: A new study has found that players who engage in historic games like Assassin's Creed or Age of Empires are driven to keep learning after they put down the controller. So historians are stepping up.
